workflow_name: UTM Link Creator & QR Code Generator with Scheduled Google Analytics Reports
tools_integrations: Excel, Google Analytics, Google Sheets, OpenAI
what_it_does: This workflow automatically collects Google Analytics data on a schedule, processes it through AI for deep insights and trend analysis, then saves the results to a structured database or spreadsheet. It enables data-driven decision making by transforming raw analytics into actionable intelligence, complete with AI-generated summaries and recommendations.

nodes.name: Schedule Google Analytics Report To Marketing Manager
Create UTM Link & Send To Database
Create QR Code With Submitted QR Link

page_title: The Vibe Marketer - 10x Your Speed To Market With AI
